00086 /* 2DO for some bizarre reason lrand48 is not included/implemented
00087  * and random_shuffle (STL) needs it or will have to use rand() 
00088  */
00089 #define __STL_NO_DRAND48
00090 /* which is switched on with the above statement */
00091 
00092 #ifndef _NT_MAIN_H_
00093 #define _NT_MAIN_H_
00094 
00095 #define NT_MAJOR_VERSION 0
00096 #define NT_MINOR_VERSION 5
00097 
00098 #define NT_STRING_LENGTH 255
00099 #define NT_SEPARATOR " ;; "
00100 
00101 #define NT_EXPORT extern
00102 #define NT_TALKLEVEL 9
00103 
00104 
00105 #define NT_GL_SUPPORT NT_TRUE
00106 #define NT_GLX_SUPPORT NT_TRUE
00107 
00108 #define NT_DEBUG true
00109 
00110 /*
00111    NT naming conventions:
00112    NT objects :
00113    NT_<indiviual name>_[<base class name>_]_o
00114    NT_stock_value_o
00115    
00116    NT object methods :
00117    returning value of a non-public variable:
00118    _<variable name>
00119    _amount()
00120    
00121    setting value of a non-public variable:
00122    set_<variable name>
00123    set_amount( int a )
00124    
00125    NT object methods :
00126    <UP-lo case>
00127    Sum
00128    
00129    "loneley" (non-object) NT functions :
00130    NT_<UP-lo case>
00131    NTsum
00132    
00133    NT variables :
00134    compond name variables, as runnId
00135    <lower case><Up-lo case>
00136    
00137    single name variables, as ll
00138    <lower case>
00139    
00140    
00141    
00142    */
00143 
00144 #endif /* _NT_MAIN_H_ */
